mapper.sql: id, uid, event, sColumn, sContent, createTime
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_user_flow
uid = #{map.uid},
event = #{map.event},
sColumn = #{map.sColumn},
sContent = #{map.sContent},
createTime = #{map.createTime},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_user_flow
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND uid like CONCAT('%', #{uid} , '%')
AND event like CONCAT('%', #{event} , '%')
AND sColumn like CONCAT('%', #{sColumn} , '%')
AND sContent like CONCAT('%', #{sContent} , '%')
AND createTime like CONCAT('%', #{createTime} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
